reports_summary: User feedback indicates Metaphor: ReFantazio runs best on the Steam Deck OLED when held to a 40 FPS target; it generally stays locked at about 40 with only brief dips to 30–31 in demanding scenes. Keeping the GPU clock around 1600 MHz and using an upscaler helps smooth frame pacing without a major visual cost. Power draw runs near 16 W, so expect shorter sessions than very efficient titles, but the game feels stable and consistent enough for regular handheld play.
